function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited testing capacity leading to underestimation of true infections","Impact":"Underestimation of true infections can lead to ineffective public health measures and the further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Increase testing capacity and expand testing to include mild and asymptomatic cases","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, mobile testing units, and contact tracing apps","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Timing of interventions and speed of implementation varying among countries","Impact":"Differences in intervention timing and speed can affect the effectiveness of control measures and outcomes of the epidemic","Mitigation":"Coordinate international efforts and information sharing, support countries with delayed intervention measures","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, international collaboration tools","People":"International health organizations, government health agencies","Owner":"International health organizations, global health initiatives"},{"Description":"Limited data on the impact of interventions and uncertainty in model estimates","Impact":"Uncertainty in model estimates and impact evaluations can lead to inappropriate decision-making and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Continuously monitor and evaluate the impact of interventions, improve data collection and reporting","Technologies":"Modeling and simulation software, data analytics tools, real-time data platforms","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
